original: aa la gupta s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aa la gupta s'a dha nam /

original: aa la gupta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: aa la gupta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement called Alaṃgupta

original: aom aa la gupte grihna pi na dam pi sh'a tsi ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa la gupte grihna pi na dam pi sh'a tsi ni sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ alaṃgupta gṛhṇa pindaṃ piśācinī svāhā.

original: zhes so // zla ba gcig zan lhag gi chang bu la sngags bzlas nas gong nas gong bzhin du sgrub pa byas na di na ra re re ster ro //
analyzed: zhes so // zla ba gcig zan lhag gi chang bu la sngags bzlas nas gong nas gong bzhin du sgrub pa byas na di na ra re re ster ro //
translated: If one repeats the mantra over a morsel of food left over from a meal for one month and performs the means of achievement in an ascending manner, [the deity] will give one dīnāra after another.

original: aa la gupta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: aa la gupta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The Means of Achievement called Alaṃgupta is complete.
